naslov: Kuća: Hvar, 239.00 m2 s pogledom na more, 50m od mora, GRAD HVAR (prodaja)
opis: Posredujemo kod prodaje kuće na Hvaru 50 m od mora, drugi red s prekrasnim otvorenim pogledom sa terase površine 100m2 u mirnom dijelu Hvara s samostojećim obiteljskim kućama u predjelu Križni rat. Do centra Hvara udaljena 10 min šetnje na jednu stranu i do najljepše plaže na Hvaru u uvali Pokonji dol, 10 minuta lagane šetnje uz more. Kuća je izgrađena 1968.g. visoko prizemlje kompletno uređeno s promijenjenim instalacijama 2010.g., dok je prizemlje uređivano 2021.g.kad i terasa i fasada, a krovište 2024.g. Kuća se sastoji od dvije etaže prizemlja i visokog prizemlja. Prizemlje djelomično ukopano stambene bruto površine 95 m2 sastoji se od apartmana sa dva ulaza s vanjske strane povezan natkrivenom terasom površine 10,53 m2, Dnevni boravak/spavaća soba i spavaća soba, obje sa vlastitim kupaonicama) Visoko prizemlje s donje ulice visina prvog kata, sastoji se od stambenog prostora bruto površine 95 m2 velike terase površine 100 m s koje je prekrasan otvoreni pogled na more, Hvarski prolaz i Paklene otoke. Garaža površine 18.60 m2. Kuća je izgrađena na zemljištu površine 600 m2, ima prekrasno ozelenjeno uređeno dvorište. Nalazi se između dvije prometnice s gornje ulice na kojem dijelu je moguće parkirati (tri) automobila i donje ulice iz koje je ulaz u garažu. S obzirom na površinu parcele na istoj je moguće rekonstrukcijom dobiti dodatnu izgrađenost po potrebama i željama novog vlasnika. Mogućnost gradnje 510 m2 GBP( građevinske bruto površine). We mediate in the sale of a house on Hvar 50 m from the sea, second row with a beautiful open view from the terrace of 100 m2 in a quiet part of Hvar with detached family houses in the Križni rat area. It is a 10-minute walk to the center of Hvar on one side and to the most beautiful beach on Hvar in Pokonji dol bay, a 10-minute easy walk along the sea. The house was built in 1968. the upper ground floor was completely renovated with changed installations in 2010, while the ground floor was (renovated) in 2021, together with the terrace and the facade, and the roof was renovated in 2024. The house consists of two floors, ground floor and upper ground floor. The ground floor, partially buried, with a gross living area of 95m2, consists of an apartment with two entrances from the outside connected by a covered terrace of 10.53m2, one living room/bedroom and one bedroom, each with its own bathroom. The high ground floor from the lower street, the height of the first floor, consists of living space with a gross area of 95m2, a large terrace of 100m from which there is a beautiful open view of the sea, the Hvar Pass and the islands.  There are 3 bedrooms, living room, kitchen bathroom and guest toilet on the main floor.) (Downstairs is the garage with an area of 18.60 m2) The house is built on a plot of land of 600m2, it has a beautiful green landscaped yard. It is located between two roads, the upper street, where it is possible to park (three) cars, and the lower street, from which you enter the garage. Considering the area of the plot, it is possible to obtain additional construction according to the needs and wishes of the new owner through reconstruction. Possibility of building 510m2 GBP (gross building area).
adresa_agencije: Adresa:VII. Retkovec 121a, 10040 Zagreb, Grad Zagreb, Hrvatska
